column4: Why is it that opening "http://www.google.com" in Firefox takes minutes, while going 'telnet google.com 80' followed by 'get index.html' takes a fraction of a second?
you have tons of rss feeds and/or extensions? that might be a factor
RSS feeds, no. And its only that page, the rest are fine... *looks at extensions*
that is odd, www.google.com/ncr loads fine here
